articles.content: 9Europe’s new heavy-lift rocket, Ariane 6, is set for its maiden flight. Liftoff is expected to occur at the opening of a four-hour launch window on Tuesday, July 9, at 18:00 UTC, with the window ext… [+14830 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Kooser
articles.title: Mars Spacecraft Spots 'Snaking Scar' At The Foot Of A Massive Volcano - Forbes
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Mars Express orbiter reveals a wild geologic feature on Mars that stretches for over 370 miles along the flank of giant volcano Arsia Mons.
articles.content:
ESA's Mars Express spacecraft captured a view of Aganippe Fossa, a deep groove at the foot of the ... [+] Arsia Mons volcano.
ESA/DLR/FU Berlin
